Start vitamins which 
contain vitamin D and folic 
acid. If you do not qualify for 
Healthy Start your midwife may 
recommend other supplements.
• If you have type 1 or type 2 
diabetes or a past history of 
gestational diabetes, telephone 
the antenatal clinic for an early 
appointment as soon as you 
realise you are pregnant.
• If you are not already taking 
folic acid supplements, you 
should start now. If you already 
have	a	baby	with	spina	bifida,	
or if you have coeliac disease,
